name: Magic and Legend: Star Seekers
description:
This is my first project trying out the capabilities of GB Studio (v2 beta 4) as well as showing my sons the kind of cool things you can do.  If you download and enjoy, let me know in the comments.

Story:

Stars are falling to earth!
The gravitational pull kept the moon in orbit!
Without stars in the sky the moon will crash into earth!
Only two heroes can save us..  Magic and Legend.

Controls:

In Level:

Start - No. of Lives and Stars left in the level
Select - Total Collected Stars vs. Total Stars in the game
Up, Down, Left, Right - Player Control
B - Jump - hold for higher jumps, tap for smaller jumps
